20101205023136.000|20101205023138.500|CCO|>> WHATEVER ARE THE MOTIVES IN 
20101205023138.500|20101205023141.000|CCO|DISSEMINATING THESE DOCUMENTS, 
20101205023141.000|20101205023143.500|CCO|IT IS CLEAR THAT RELEASING THEM 
20101205023143.500|20101205023146.000|CCO|POSES REAL RISKS TO REAL 
20101205023146.000|20101205023148.500|CCO|PEOPLE, AND OFTEN TO THE VERY 
20101205023148.500|20101205023151.000|CCO|PEOPLE WHO HAVE DEDICATED THEIR 
20101205023151.000|20101205023153.000|CCO|OWN LIVES TO PROTECTING OTHERS. 
20101205023153.000|20101205023155.000|CCO|>> THE 220 DOCUMENTS THAT THE 
20101205023155.000|20101205023157.000|CCO|SECRETARY OF STATE REFERS TO 
20101205023157.000|20101205023159.000|CCO|WERE RELEASED BY WICK CAN HE 
20101205023159.000|20101205023201.000|CCO|LEAKS THIS PAST SUNDAY. 
20101205023201.000|20101205023203.000|CCO|IT WAS A FIRST BATCH OF MORE 
20101205023203.000|20101205023205.000|CCO|THAN A QUARTER OF A MILLION 
20101205023205.000|20101205023207.000|CCO|DOCUMENTS YET TO ME. 
20101205023207.000|20101205023209.000|CCO|WIKILEAKS IS, OF COURSE, A WEB 
20101205023209.000|20101205023211.000|CCO|SITE, WIKILEAKS.ORG. 
20101205023211.000|20101205023212.667|CCO|THE STATED MISSION OF  
20101205023212.667|20101205023214.333|CCO|WIKILEAKS.IS TO EXPOSE THE 
20101205023214.333|20101205023216.000|CCO|INNER WORKINGS OF GOVERNMENTS 
20101205023216.000|20101205023217.667|CCO|AND CORPORATIONS AND PROMOTE 
20101205023217.667|20101205023219.333|CCO|TRANSPARENCY GENERALLY. 
20101205023219.333|20101205023221.000|CCO|WIKILEAKS  DOES NOT BELIEVE IN 
20101205023221.000|20101205023222.667|CCO|GOVERNMENT SECRECY UNDER ANY 
20101205023222.667|20101205023224.333|CCO|CIRCUMSTANCE. 
20101205023224.333|20101205023226.000|CCO|STRUCTURALLY, WIKILEAKS IS MADE 
20101205023226.000|20101205023227.667|CCO|UP OF IN M. DECENTRALIZED GREWS 
20101205023227.667|20101205023229.333|CCO|IN SCATTERED LOCATIONS THAT 
20101205023229.333|20101205023231.000|CCO|COLLABORATE ON PROJECTS. 
20101205023231.000|20101205023232.667|CCO|THE RECENT DOCUMENT DUMP 
20101205023232.667|20101205023234.333|CCO|REVEALS SENSITIVE U.S. 
20101205023234.333|20101205023236.000|CCO|DIPLOMATIC CORRESPONDENCE. 
20101205023236.000|20101205023237.667|CCO|MANY OF THE DOCUMENTS DISCUSS 
20101205023237.667|20101205023239.333|CCO|STRATEGY AND THE WAR ON TERROR. 
20101205023239.333|20101205023241.000|CCO|THIS INCLUDES BACK ROOM DEALS 
20101205023241.000|20101205023242.667|CCO|BETWEEN U.S. DIPLOMATS AND 
20101205023242.667|20101205023244.333|CCO|FOREIGN DIPLOMATS, EVEN 
20101205023244.333|20101205023246.000|CCO|LEADERS. 
20101205023246.000|20101205023247.667|CCO|OR DOCUMENTS REVEAL SOME SAY 
20101205023247.667|20101205023249.333|CCO|OFFENSIVE COMMENTS ABOUT 
20101205023249.333|20101205023251.000|CCO|CERTAIN HEADS OF STATE.

20101205023257.667|20101205023259.333|CCO|IRAQ, AFGHANISTAN.
